CustomField.description: Contains a semi-colon delimited list of language keys that specify which languages the admin wants to be shown in the language picklist on the main PKB search page. This field should not be on a page layout; it is populated via the pkb_Settings page.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Contains a semi-colon delimited list of language keys that specify which languages the admin wants to be shown in the language picklist on the main PKB search page. This field should not be on a page layout; it is populated via the pkb_Settings page.
CustomField.label: Selected Languages
